channel.title: QRP on research notebook
channel.description: Recent content in QRP on research notebook

item.title: Retreat Reproducibility Session
item.description: Session Planning Focus: Reproducibility in practice - QRPs. Session aim: To help spread awareness among Qaecologists and Cebranalysts about reproducibility issues in our research practices. And then possibly provide people with the tools / solutions to overcome some of these issues. Format: not a lecture, not an unstructured discussion. Length 90 minutes. Introduction: 15 minutes Introductory talk with a few slides . Led by Fiona and Hannah. Intro by Fiona, perhaps talking about why reproducibility is important to us as ecologists, the state of reproducibility in eco/evo, an in the context of other dsciplines?
